data.question: What is the crystal system of the Cu2Cl2(BVD) complex?

data.answer: An increasingly important superexchange through the copper(I) center

data.answer: To model the temperature dependence of the susceptibility for all three compounds

data.question: Is the ground state of the copper complexes of BVD a singlet?

data.answer: Antiferromagnetic exchange predominates in all three complexes

data.answer: It is a relatively strong π acceptor

data.question: What does the broad maximum in the susceptibility indicate?
data.answer: Antiferromagnetic exchange predominates in all three complexes

data.answer: The presence of doublet radical impurities
